Class Alien

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameCharacter
      • Alien

  • public class Alien
extends GameCharacter
    An object of class Alien represents an alien in the game.

    Represents a character in the game.

    January 29, 2025

    Janurary 28, 2025

    Author:
    Abdon Morales, am226923, abdonm@cs.utexas.edu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Alien(java.lang.String name, int health, int attack, int speed, int speedDamage)
      Constructor: an instance with a name, health, attack, speed, and damage

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fight(Ripley ripley)
      This method is for the alien to fight the opponent, in which this case is Ripley or the playable character.
      int getSpeedDamage()
      This method gets the speed damage that the alien can do or cause.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Alien

        public Alien(java.lang.String name,
             int health,
             int attack,
             int speed,
             int speedDamage)
        Constructor: an instance with a name, health, attack, speed, and damage
        Parameters:
        name - is the parameter for the name of the alien, i.e Face Hugger, Queen, so on.
        health - is the parameter for the health of the alien.
        attack - is the parameter for the attack damage inflicted by the alien.
        speed - is the parameter for the speed of the alien.
        speedDamage - is the parameter for how much damage the alien can inflict on speed.

    • Method Detail

      • fight

        public void fight(Ripley ripley)
        This method is for the alien to fight the opponent, in which this case is Ripley or the playable character.
        Parameters:
        ripley, - is the Ripley object, for the alien to have access and fight Ripley/player.

      • getSpeedDamage

        public int getSpeedDamage()
        This method gets the speed damage that the alien can do or cause.
        Returns:
        speedDamage, returns the amount of speed damage that the alien can cause against the player
